intro: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Dark Angels Space Marine chapter oder any of its successor chapters.
strategy: Space Marine Armeen haben einen Strategiewert von 5.
Initiative: All Verbände haben eine Initiative von 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all Dark Angels detachments.

formations.name: Ravenwing Attack
formations.units: Ein Black Knights, vier Ravenwing Assault Bikes, drei Ravenwing Land Speeders

formations.name: Deathwing Strike
formations.units: Any vier of the following units: Terminatoren, Cyclone Terminatoren

sections.name: Dark Angels Support Detachments
sections.description: Drei Support Detachments may be taken pro Core Detachment

formations.name: Ares Siege
formations.units: Drei Land Raider Ares, zwei Vindicators

formations.name: Devastoren
formations.units: Vier Dark Angels Devastoren plus transport

formations.name: Predators
formations.units: Vier Predator Destructors und/oder Predator Annihilators

sections.name: Ravenwing Aircraft & Dark Angels Swordwing
sections.description: Bis zu einem Drittel der verfügbaren Punkte dürfen für these formations. Ein Swordwing Support formation must be taken

Erweiterungen.title: Dark Angels Erweiterungen
Erweiterungen.description: Jeweils upgrade may be taken once pro detachment

items.name: Trikes
items.description: Ersetze any number of Assault Bikes mit einem equal number of Trikes

items.name: Deathwing Knights
items.description: Ersetze eine unit of Terminatoren with Deathwing Knights

items.name: Strike Cruiser
items.description: Ersetze the Hunter Class Destroyer mit einemStrike Cruiser

items.name: Befehlshaber
items.description: Füge any eine of the following characters to any unit in the formation

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Choose eine of the following options

items.name: Land Raiders
items.description: Füge any number of Land Raiders, bis zu the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Füge any number of Razorbacks, bis zu the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Scharfschützen
items.description: Give all Aufklärers in the formation 'Scharfschütze' on their Schwerer Bolter

items.name: Venegance
items.description: Ersetze vier Ravenwing Land Speeder Tornado with vier Ravenwing Land Speeder Venegance

usage: The EA-R Dark Angels list is inspired by the E-UK version of the list, but the differences are obviously way more numerous than the similarities. Für example, while the Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf on the Ravenwing formations has been retained, the Deathwing rule has been dropped, und the Telemetrieempfänger rule is greatly expanded.

Apart from the rigid structure und the changes inherited from the EA-R Codex Astartes list, the most major difference is that it has no access to air assault formations, but strongly encourages the player to concentrate on the Teleportieren aspects of the Dark Angels fluff, und bringing a strong ground game. The Battle Barge has been replaced with the Hunter Class Destroyer, which provides the army mit einemcheaper way to use the Telemetrieempfänger special rule.

A great number of the Dark Angels' many special units has been added, somewhat compensating für the loss of air assault options und Collegia Titanica allies. The Glaive, being a relic Horus Heresy technology, has been restricted to eine formation für thematic purposes, while the normal Cybot loadouts have been replaced with the Mortis AA variant. The Land Speeder Typhoon has been replaced with the Land Speeder Venegance, und the formation reduced to vier units to keep the cost down, und make the formation more competitive with the Aufklärer formation. The Sturmtrupp detachment was expanded to sechs units und comes mit einemDark Angels Captain as standard (providing Telemetrieempfänger), making them more relevant in a list without Thunderhawks. The Nephilim is now more similar to the Storm Talon, und the Dark Talon provides the list mit einemFighter-Bomber option.
